results.title: The Effect of Metformin on Plasma Prolactin Levels in Young Women with Autoimmune Thyroiditis
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ decreases elevated @GENE_PRL @GENE_5617 @@@prolactin@@@ levels, which are frequently found in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@thyroid disorders@@@.

results.text_hl: Additionally, some evidence suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may also improve @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@thyroid morphological abnormalities@@@.

results.title: Comorbidities of hypothyroidism.
results.text_hl: Other common treatments, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, glucocorticoids or proton pump inhibitors among others, may alter levels of @CHEMICAL_Thyrotropin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013972 @@@thyrotropin@@@, thus impacting on the monitoring of @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@thyroid dysfunction@@@ and the diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@thyroid dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Interventions to prevent women from developing gestational diabetes mellitus: an overview of Cochrane Reviews.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Fatty_Acids_Omega_3 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015525 @@@Omega-3-fatty acid@@@ supplementation and universal screening for @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@thyroid dysfunction@@@ did not alter the risk of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@GDM@@@.

results.title: Thyroid Dysfunction and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Screening Strategies and Implications for Management
results.text_hl: Poorly managed @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ can lead to @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ and hyperinsulinaemia, which causes thyroid tissue proliferation and increases nodule formation and @DISEASE_Goiter @DISEASE_MESH:D006042 @@@goitre@@@ size. In addition, while @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can be beneficial in both @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@TD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, other antidiabetics such as @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Thiazolidinediones @CHEMICAL_MESH:D045162 @@@thiazolidinediones@@@ can negatively impact @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@TD@@@.

citations.NLM: Kalra S, Aggarwal S, Khandelwal D. Thyroid Dysfunction and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Screening Strategies and Implications for Management Diabetes Ther. 2019 Dec;10(6):2035-2044. PMID: 31583645
citations.BibTeX: @article{31583645, title={Thyroid Dysfunction and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: Screening Strategies and Implications for Management}, author={Kalra S and Aggarwal S and Khandelwal D}, journal={Diabetes Ther}, volume={10}, number={6}, pages={2035-2044}}

results.title: Metformin and thyroid: an update.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Most studies suggest a TSH suppressive action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in subjects with overt or subclinical @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013959 @@@thyroid dysfunction@@@, while this is not apparent in euthyroid individuals.

citations.NLM: Pappa T, Alevizaki M. Metformin and thyroid: an update. Eur Thyroid J. 2013 Mar;2(1):22-8. PMID: 24783035
citations.BibTeX: @article{24783035, title={Metformin and thyroid: an update.}, author={Pappa T and Alevizaki M}, journal={Eur Thyroid J}, volume={2}, number={1}, pages={22-8}}
